General.Name: Develia S.A
General.Description: Develia S.A., through its subsidiaries, buys, develops, rents, manages, and sells real estate properties in Poland. It operates through Rental Services, Property Development Activity, and Holding (Other) Activity segments. It undertakes the development of commercial and residential investment projects located in Warsaw, Wroclaw, Kraków, Katowice, Gdansk, and Lódz. The company was formerly known as LC Corp S.A. and changed its name to Develia S.A. in September 2019. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Wroclaw, Poland.
